title: project lucian
body:
Hello league
I bought Project Lucian on 8.15.2015 but i did not get Lucian edge
Could you give me that edge?

replies.body: The first strike borders during the recent even were only for the [Project Disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) skins.  Project Lucian is from a previous event, and would not be eligible for a first strike border.  Though a border was not available this time around, congrats on the skin and have fun roughing up your opponents!
The Lucian first strike border was only given to those who purchased the skin during its first week of release. Are you sure you bought it then?

i bought 3days ago
My friend said if you buy that i can get that 
so i bought that
Well, wherever your friend got the information, he was wrong. Sorry.
